name: Adonis Decay - Messenger
description: Adonis Decay comes rolling in with scythe in hand ready for the slaying with their debut 5 song EP entitled “Messenger”, breaking out with their very own brand of unrelenting Death Metal. The diversity and utter bloodlust that this album purports is nothing short of golden, from the opening track ‘Leviathan’ the speed and crushing metallic abrasion will grab you by the throat and hurtle you into the world of Adonis Decays “Messenger.”

name: Time of Cholera - Collapse of the Forsaken
description: Just, fucking, awesome. TIME OF CHOLERA

name: The Hottness - s/t
description: A 5-piece Hard Rock/Punk/Southern Metal band out of Wilmigton, NC, THE HOTTNESS are unique with their approach to a some what watered down underground scene. With a sound composed of driving guitar riffs, flowing beats, thick breakdowns and southern style inspired vocal hooks, THE HOTTNESS have found a new way to showcase the already over populated Southern Rock/Metalcore scene. Although there is a heavy punk influence in style, THE HOTTNESS still know how to slow it down with melodic vocals and keep it alive with sing/chant along parts for the kids.
